content.title: NFI Using Third-Party Library
content.body:
Native Function Interfaces (NFIs) are JavaScript wrappers that help an app developer to implement Android or iOS specific features in Volt MX Iris.


In this hike, we will implement the Barcode Scanner feature in an app using Android-specific frameworks and NFIs.


Barcodes store and track a variety of data such as product model numbers, batch numbers, and price. A barcode scanner or reader captures and reads the information given in a barcode.
